alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:54AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott and southeastern Morgan Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 753 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alsey, or near Winchester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Murrayville, Woodson, Manchester, Alsey, Glasgow, Nortonville and Riggston. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 52 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
